ValidationRule.description: This VR prevents the user from updating the case status to 'Awaiting Response' if there is a valid auto-solve response on the case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Parent.Record_Type_Name__c = 'Engagement', $Permission.CX_Labs_Custom_Permission, NOT(Incoming), ISPICKVAL(Parent.Auto_Solve_Status__c, 'Eligible'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Parent.QA_Status__c, 'Approved')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Parent.QA_Status__c, 'Rejected')), NOT(Solve_Email__c), NOT(BEGINS(TextBody, 'Chat Started')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There is a valid auto-solve response on this Case that needs to be approved or rejected before you will be able to manually email the customer. To prevent losing the email you've composed, copy it before you proceed with the auto-solve QA process.
